document.full_text: novartis ag's bexsero vaccine helps protect toddlers against the most common cause of meningitis when used as a booster, the swiss drugmaker said on thursday, giving its meningitis franchise another lift.
document.title: novartis vaccine shields against meningitis cause
lines_and_colors: novartis ag's bexsero vaccine helps protect toddlers against the most common cause of meningitis when used as a booster, the swiss drugmaker said on thursday, giving its meningitis franchise another lift.
